data.text: @iDeepK1 Sir, we can surely assist you in adding a wheelchair. Please allow us some time and we'll do it at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Baggage Allowance, IndiGo Baggage Allowance | IndiGo
urls.description: Get the detailed information on Indigo baggage allowance for your all domestic flights as well as international flights. Know the number and weight of baggage prices you are allowed to carry during your journey.

data.text: @prapticb03 Ms Chowdhury, we understand your experience was not up to the mark. However, only 1 piece of check-in luggage of 15 kg is allowed per passenger per sector. Please visit https://t.co/qHYQwbubKQ to know detailed info on the same. We'll request your understanding! ~Snigdha

@robnewcombe We regret to learn that, Mr Newcomber. We'll quickly check this and get back to you. ~Snigdha
  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@IndiGo6E Mr Bhansali, please help us with your PNR via DM so we can share this with the concerned team at the earliest. Thanks. ~Ojasvi

@indiacriticss Hi, we never wish to separate a family flying together by assigning separate row seats hence always request to pre-book your preferred seats online. Our staff at the airport check-in counter also try their best to assign seats together.  ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Book Domestic & International Flights at Lowest Airfare - IndiGo
urls.description: Online flight booking with IndiGo. Book your domestic & international flight tickets at the lowest airfare with best offers at goIndiGo.in website and app.

data.text: @jena5_sonukumar Mr Jena, we understand your concern. However, we see that a partial refund has been made basis the sector you have not traveled. You may visit the 'Edit Booking' page on our website https://t.co/7UGOtouYYS to check the refund details. ~Snigdha
@jammihal_ravi Sir, we're glad our staff could assist you well and hope you were reunited with your belongings. We'll definitely pass your kudos to the team right away. ~Ojasvi #GoIndiGo
@devsingh_2022 Sir, we have replied to your DM. ~Snigdha
@RajatGuptaKnl Sir, please share a copy of the first page of your passport via DM so we can check and assist. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@Priyesh99868997 Hi, this doesn't seem right to us. Please help us with your PNR via DM and we'll get back to you right away. ~Ojasvi
@RONITRAAZZ Sir, please note that IndiGo never charges any fee for selection/training from potential candidates. We request you to not make any payment for the same. ~Ojasvi
@sathish_6 Sir, this doesn't seem right to us. We would like to have a check on this on priority. Please help us with your PNR via DM and we'll get back to you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

@ramanathan_sm Sir, we truly understand how you must have felt. We have shared your experience with the relevant team for the briefing of the staff. We'll certainly wish to provide you with better experiences on future flights with us. See you onboard Soon! ~Snigdha

@PunjaniRamesh Sir, we understand your frustration here. Please be assured that we are sharing the feedback with the concerned team for necessary review. We hope to provide a better experience in the future. ~Ojasvi

@Er_JatinMehta Sir, as checked, the wheelchair is added to the mentioned PNR. Further, we believe our airport team has addressed your concern. Do let us know via DM if any further assistance is required. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@rajiv_jajodia Sir, our team representative will connect with you asap. ~Kritika

urls.title: Dangerous Goods, Things not allowed in flight | IndiGo
urls.description: Visit this page to know about which items are prohibited in checked and cabin baggage and what not? Get all information about our dangerous goods policy.

data.text: @Anjell485 Sir, please visit https://t.co/MvCC9wfUlK to check the allowed and restricted items. ~Kritika

@rajesh305562031 Thank you so much for the appreciation, Sir. We work round the clock to ensure and improve customer comfort. Your word of thanks will be passed on to the appropriate team. Wish to see you onboard soon, again. #goIndiGo ~Kritika
@PreronaDey10 Ma'am, we are concerned to hear this. Please share your PNR via DM so we can assist at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@one_the_na Ma'am, please write to 'groups@goindigo.in'. Thanks. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Web check-in with seat selection & boarding pass - IndiGo
urls.description: Mandatory web check-in to minimize contact while traveling and avoid long queues at the airport. Web check-in for free 48 hours to 60 minutes before flight.

data.text: @ASHWINKRISH1 Hi, you may use this link for web check-in https://t.co/EU9Ys2f2QO to web check-in. Do let us know via DM if the issue still persists. ~Ojasvi
@one_the_na Ms Sharma, since it is a group booking, please write an email to groups@goinidigo.in for any assistance. ~Ojasvi
@AryanKu44120065 Hi, please know that in order to avail Student booking allowance, it is mandatory to book under the STUD fare. We hope for your understanding. ~Ojasvi
@Mgd1074 Hi, please share the PNR via DM so we can check and assist. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@harryshelke Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please help us with your PNR via DM so we can check and assist. ~Ojasvi

@BhartiChawre Ma'am, this is not the service we intend to provide. As checked, the airport team has already addressed your concern. Further, we have taken your feedback into consideration and look forward to a more favorable experience on your future flights with us. ~Ojasvi
@SoundVid Thank you for your warm words, Ma'am. Your word of thanks will be shared with the concerned team. We are looking forward to many such warm trips, together. :) ~Ojasvi #GoIndiGO
@PrintPackGo Hi, please reach out to the visa issuing authority for any assistance in this regard. ~Ojasvi
@chaitan63384566 Hi, this doesn't look right to us. Please share details via DM so we can check and assist. Thanks. ~Ojasvi

@dude_basu Mr Basu, if you do not wish to pay for the seat while doing the web check-in, please click on the 'auto-assign' option which is available 6 hours prior to the departure and a seat will be assigned to you as per the availability. ~Sheetal

@lawabiding_indn Thank you so much for the appreciation, Sir. We work round the clock to ensure and improve customer comfort. Your word of thanks will be passed on to the appropriate team. Wish to see you onboard soon, again. #goIndiGo ~Sheetal

@gorgeouspotahto Mr Sareen, this seems sad :( We hope he received the baggage for the other functions, could you please drop his PNR via DM so we may have a closer look into this? ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

urls.title: How to Check-in | Print Boarding Pass - IndiGo
urls.description: IndiGo offers you multiple check-in options. Save time by online check-in or using the IndiGo mobile app. You can also download & print boarding pass online.

data.text: @subbu2805 Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. We request you visit https://t.co/ixkCPKQX6a to download the Boarding Passes. Do let us know in case you face any issues, we'll assist you. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@okpintu Mr Prasad, truly regret to see you disappointed. Please share your experience in detail via DM for us to share with the concerned team. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@office63su Sir, you may carry the induction stove in your check-in baggage. ~Sheetal

@sindoor227 You can choose any of the free seats online, subject to availability or opt for auto-seat assignment & complete the web check-in wherein the boarding pass will be sent to the registered email ID within 12-3 hrs prior to the departure. ~Linda (2/2)

domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Textile, Apparel & Luxury Good Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to apparel and accessories

domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

urls.title: IndiGo Excess Baggage Information | IndiGo
urls.description: Find out all about our rules for taking an oversized piece of baggage at IndiGo. Check out our excess baggage charges and services. Passengers can also book pre-paid excess baggage up to 2 hours prior to the scheduled departure of their domestic flight.

data.text: @BabaVancouver Hi, please visit https://t.co/mbmdJXFqgx to get detailed info on the same. Thanks.~Vaishali
@vekeroy Hi, we regret the inconvenience. Your details are noted and we will raise it with the concerned team for review and rectification.~Vaishali

@pankajkanal @manishasinghal Hi, a low level Go-Around was carried out. Go-Around was performed as per the established procedure. Please be assured safety of our passengers is our number one priority and our pilots are well-trained for all such circumstances. You're in safe hands! ~Linda
@surajmysun123 Hi, we advise you to you carry an Aadhar card, or school id card as ID proof.~Vaishali
@logicallyours Hi, your feedback is duly noted in this regard & will be shared with the concerned team. Hope to serve you better in the future. ~Linda
@DDhakshayani Hi, please be informed, dry coconut/copra is prohibited for carriage. However, coconuts (white portion) in small chunks can be carried. ~Linda
